# Setup

```{r auth, warning=FALSE}
library(googleAuthR)
library(googleCloudVertexAIR)

options(googleAuthR.scopes.selected = "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform")

gar_auth_service(json_file = Sys.getenv("GAR_SERVICE_JSON"))
```

# Set global arguements

```{r vair-global-arguements}
projectId <- Sys.getenv("GCVA_DEFAULT_PROJECT_ID")
gcva_region_set("us-central1")
gcva_project_set(projectId)
```

# List datasets

```{r}
datasets_list <- gcva_list_datasets()
datasets_list
```

# Create a dataset

```{r}
vair_dataset <- vair_create_dataset(displayName = "example_dataset03",
                                    gcsSource = "gs://gcatr-dev/bank_marketing.csv")
vair_dataset
```

# List datasets (again)

```{r}
datasets_list <- vair_list_datasets()
datasets_list
```

# Delete dataset

```{r}
vair_delete_result <- vair_delete_dataset(displayName = "example_dataset01")
vair_delete_result
```

# List datasets

```{r}
vair_list_datasets()
```
